title: 6.1.2 Implement entrypoint.py startup sequence
body:
## Parent Issue
#23 - 6.1 Container Packaging

## Objective
Create the container entrypoint script that orchestrates startup sequence.

## Requirements
- Validate required environment variables
- Wait for database connectivity (60s timeout)
- Run Alembic migrations
- Initialize IB Platform
- Load compliance KB
- Validate Marketplace license (if enabled)
- Start FastAPI with uvicorn

## Implementation

```python
# src/cloud_optimizer/entrypoint.py
import asyncio
import uvicorn
from cloud_optimizer.config import settings

async def main():
    # 1. Validate environment
    validate_required_env_vars()
    
    # 2. Wait for database
    await wait_for_database(timeout=60)
    
    # 3. Run migrations
    await run_migrations()
    
    # 4. Initialize IB Platform
    ib_platform = await initialize_ib_platform()
    
    # 5. Load compliance KB
    await load_compliance_kb()
    
    # 6. Validate Marketplace license
    license_status = await validate_marketplace_license()
    
    # 7. Create and start app
    app = create_app(ib_platform=ib_platform, license_status=license_status)
    config = uvicorn.Config(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)
    server = uvicorn.Server(config)
    await server.serve()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())
```

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/entrypoint.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Container starts successfully with all deps
- [ ] Fails fast with clear error if DB unavailable
- [ ] Migrations run automatically
- [ ] Startup completes in < 60 seconds

## Estimated Time
2 hours
